:: About Me

Paul. 22. Coder by Day, Coder by night

Ok, maybe not all the time. I have other passions. But programmation and developping various applications might be the first.

I focus primaraly on creating web apps for various clients, and sometimes for myself. I work on all the stack, trying my best day after day to produce high quality results.

I do this for almost five years now, and I still love it.

I regularly use : Ruby on Rails, Sinatra, HTML5, Sass, JavaScript, Git and Emacs.

You can see some of my projects here.

If you want to contact me for one of your projects, you can contact me to this address: paulmcfreely @ gmail . com
